Articles.Content: Hey guys, I got a problem. I just installed a new version of windows 7 64x and ofcourse the first game I download is Ksp. However when I first launched it and made a new sandbox game the entire screen was upside down! (except for the buttons). I have looked around on the internet and can't find anything on this. I really hope someone has a solution for this because I would love to play the new 1.0.5 update

Er, there's no KSP bug that does this, I think you need to check your graphics driver.

If you upload your KSP output_log.txt to dropbox or pastebin I can take a look, also run dxdiag from the start menu and make a hardware report, it'll show your driver number.
